SEARCH
Package au.csiro.pathling.projection

Interface ProjectionClause

All Known Subinterfaces:
CompositeSelection, UnarySelection
All Known Implementing Classes:
ColumnSelection, GroupingSelection, RepeatSelection, UnionSelection, UnnestingSelection
public interface ProjectionClause
Represents a component of an abstract query for projecting FHIR data.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • evaluate

      @Nonnull ProjectionResult evaluate(@Nonnull ProjectionContext context)
      Converts this clause into a result using the supplied context.
      Parameters:
      context - The context in which to evaluate this clause
      Returns:
      The result of evaluating this clause

    • asColumnOperator

      @Nonnull default UnaryOperator<Column> asColumnOperator(@Nonnull ProjectionContext context)
      Converts this projection clause into a column operator that can be applied to individual elements in a collection.

      This is useful for per-element evaluation in transformations like unnesting and recursive traversal. The returned operator evaluates this projection clause using the provided column as input context.

      Parameters:
      context - The projection context containing execution environment
      Returns:
      A unary operator that takes a column and returns the projection result column

    • evaluateElementWise

      @Nonnull default Column evaluateElementWise(@Nonnull ProjectionContext context)
      Evaluates this projection clause element-wise on the input column in the provided context.
      Parameters:
      context - The projection context containing execution environment
      Returns:
      The resulting column after element-wise evaluation

    • getChildren

      @Nonnull default Stream<ProjectionClause> getChildren()
      Returns a stream of child projection clauses.

      The default implementation returns an empty stream for leaf nodes. Implementations with children should override this method.

      Returns:
      a stream of child projection clauses

    • toExpression

      @Nonnull String toExpression()
      Returns an expression string representation of this clause.

      Used by toExpressionTree(int) to display this node in the tree.

      Returns:
      a string representation of this clause's expression

    • toExpressionTree

      @Nonnull default String toExpressionTree()
      Returns a tree-like string representation of this clause for debugging purposes.
      Returns:
      a formatted tree string representation

    • toExpressionTree

      @Nonnull default String toExpressionTree(int level)
      Returns a tree-like string representation of this clause for debugging purposes.

      The default implementation uses toExpression() for this node and recursively calls itself on children from getChildren().

      Parameters:
      level - the indentation level for the tree structure
      Returns:
      a formatted tree string representation
